system.description: This Edge allows you to enchant potions, imbuing them with spells of up to Seasoned rank. Potions have a rank-specific price of 100 gp, and contain a single dose and a single spell. Only spells that individually target one or more other creatures or objects can be placed in potions. The result of your spellcasting roll determines how effective the potion will be when consumed. Potions can be readied as a normal action (or a free action if you have Quick Draw or a potion belt), and used as a normal action, or both readied and used as a full-round action (no movement or other actions allowed). You must have at least one hand free in order to ready and/or use a potion.
